title: Hundreds of protesters took place the strike and march in Igoumenitsa
content:
The farmers, who had a block in Egnatia and closed the entrance of the port daily, for over 20 days for a two -hour period, participated by agricultural machinery and block. Public workers' unions, the Labor Center and Private Workers, Trade Unions and Political Organizations were also involved. Noteworthy was the participation of students with their own blocs from most of the city's high schools and high schools, despite the threats to some of the management that there will be miscarriages.

The class course had its own block shouting slogans against the anti -populist murderous policy of the system and distributed its announcement in the previous days in workplaces.

The rage in all the pieces of the people was evident, as was the reflection on discussions about the continuation of the struggle that must be common, a reflection that did not find a response from trade unions, as many realized that there was this gap in the face of escalation. attack.
author: Αντίσταση στις γειτονιές!
